body.value:
Vardoc provides a great deal of functionality out of the box, which makes it possible for you to prototype your knowledge base, and try out and experiment all the available features.

However, if you need professional support for implementation, customization, training, or hosted management, please contact Vardot at https://www.vardot.com/contact

You may also contact Vardot for professional and enterprise support of Vardoc by sending an email to: sales@vardot.com
